title: Mandatory ethics training course
context: [ยง84-42] Mandatory ethics training course. All state officers and employees enumerated in section 84-41 shall complete an ethics training course administered by the state ethics commission as provided in this part. For the purposes of this part, &ldquo;ethics training&rdquo; includes education and training in: (1) The ethics laws set forth in this chapter; and (2) The lobbying laws set forth in chapter 97.
